nodes.description: 伊拉克多地今日发生针对什叶派朝圣者的爆炸袭击
nodes.support_text: the bombings across Iraq today which mainly targeted Shia pilgrims in Baghdad and elsewhere.

nodes.description: 中东事务部长对袭击表示震惊并强烈谴责
nodes.support_text: I was appalled to hear of the bombings across Iraq today

nodes.description: 部长向遇难者家属致以深切慰问
nodes.support_text: offer my deepest condolences to the families of those who lost their lives and those who were injured

nodes.description: 部长呼吁伊拉克各政治派别合作保障国家安全
nodes.support_text: I urge all political blocs in Iraq to work together and focus on bringing security and stability to all of Iraq

nodes.description: 中东部长听到针对什叶派朝圣者的轰炸事件
nodes.support_text: I was appalled to hear of the bombings across Iraq today

nodes.description: 中东部长就轰炸事件发表声明
nodes.support_text: I strongly condemn these cowardly attacks and offer my deepest condolences

edges.support_text: Reacting to the reports the Minister for the Middle East said
Reacting to the reports the Minister for the Middle East said
I strongly condemn these cowardly attacks and offer my deepest condolences
I urge all political blocs in Iraq to work together
I urge all political blocs in Iraq to work together
